params.feedId: The feedId to get the results for

setAggregatorAuthority(bytes32,address).details: Only the authority of the aggregator can set a new authority

params.aggregatorId: The aggregatorId to set the authority for
params.authority: The new authority to set for the aggregator

setAggregatorConfig(bytes32,string,uint2.details: Only the authority of the aggregator can set the config

params.aggregatorId: The aggregatorId to set the config for
params.cid: The content id (IPFS cid for example) for the feed
params.feedId: The feedId associated with the aggregator
params.maxStaleness: The maximum number of seconds staleness for an update to be valid
params.maxVariance: The maximum variance allowed for a feed result
params.minResponses: The minimum number of responses required for a valid feed result
params.minSamples: The minimum number of samples to take for a feed result
params.name: The name of the aggregator
params.toleratedDelta: The maximum staleness blocks for a valid feed result (or seconds if the queue has a time feed)

getAggregatorResults(bytes32).notice: Get the results for a feed

setAggregatorAuthority(bytes32,address).notice: Set the authority for an aggregator

setAggregatorConfig(bytes32,string,uint2.notice: Set the config for an aggregator
